name: UltraEpicRiverRanger
description:
Virtual Reality Game made in 48h for the SAE & WWF GameJam.

You play as an ultra epic ranger that defends the river from junk falling down and flames that are trying to burn down the forest. Try to destroy as many dangerous elements as possible with your super powers but dont hit them with the wrong element! You may gain or lose points through that!

Virtual Reality Gear needed to play.

Made by Berat Yagiz Ünlü, Patrick Kokoszka, Lukas Häusig,  and Kai Bangert
